name: Solace Dreams
summary: Solace Dreams is a stand alone total conversion mod, made to run exclusively for GZDoom using such features like dynamic lighting and most importantly animated voxels. It takes inspiration from games like Silent Hill and Dark souls and combines them both to make what you see here. You play as Yuna, a school girl who must face off against a large variety of enemi﻿es & bosses in all kinds of unique locations. It has a estimated game play length of 2+hours and infinite replayability with new game plus, with added features like boss rush mode and surviva﻿l.
